messages.message:
<!here> Hello eng! In order to provide consistency and transparency in our release cycles, I have created a release calendar for 2019 as well as instructions for preparing each release in the cycle.
Release calendar: `https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/10AurrGBBrE7J7BjMJa1at7SSgq00ZPemuybTUm3kPHM/edit#gid=0`
Release process: `https://docs.google.com/document/d/1wed2T_zpIUamX5_4AzVoqsgm7wOeOtZ8b_ykIZdapyw/edit#heading=h.ahoza81cjfke`

Thoughts? Feel free to edit the document.

Can I request two things.

1. It's critical for us to understand what version of software customers have when pushing Flow and Refiner solutions. Let us know how we can most easily accomplish that

2. Release notes! We'd benefit from a more centralized / coordinated process

3. Clients themselves struggle to understand what version and instance they are running. As a client coordinator it'd empower the customer if they could tell me what version their environment was running
Ack! I agree on all the points. Can we chat on some of these things? I'll need your help on some of these tasks.
sounds good — happy to chat about release notes and versioning — we can dedicate some time there
